files.description: Deterministically generates results.json and figure.png for mean vs median-of-means metrics using a fixed RNG seed and stable serialization/plot settings.
Provides utilities to enforce deterministic behavior across numpy/random/matplotlib and stable JSON/PNG writing for byte-identical outputs.
Implements the mean and median-of-means estimators plus metric calculations in a deterministic, numerically stable manner.
Creates the comparison plot and saves figure.png with deterministic styling, layout, and rendering parameters.
Example deterministic output JSON containing computed metrics and parameters for the mean vs median-of-means experiment.
Example deterministic plot image produced from results.json showing mean vs median-of-means performance.
Documents how to run the deterministic generation script, expected outputs, and how to reproduce identical bytes across runs using the same seed.
Defines Python project metadata and pinned runtime dependencies (numpy, matplotlib) to support reproducible deterministic output generation.

missionDescription: Implement deterministic generation of results.json (e.g., metrics for mean vs median-of-means) and a corresponding plot saved to figure.png; ensure identical bytes/values across runs given the same seed.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Defines the minimum concrete artifact set (/outputs/results.json and /outputs/figure.png) for goal_33, ensuring the toy experiment produces both machine-checkable and human-inspectable outputs....
